all i can say is how did i miss this game over a decade ago busy with life is my only excuse it holds up with some of the best current rpgs and better than many the graphical artist should have won awards for how beautiful the game looks and plays the gui is very user friendly and intuitive it pulls from some of the best features of homm and adds many new feature that really add so much flavor and replay value if you like rpg style games you cant go wrong with this game
awesome game great time waster great turn based tactical combat more in depth than the other games in the series highly recommendedmy fav in the series by far

i pleyed all the kb games back when owning pc games on disc was a thing and im glad so see they hold up wellcrossworlds is imo the best kings bounty game its bit harder than the legend with far more interesting skill trees reworked and rebalanced units and lot qol improvements and with better designed campaign than  later two games
best of the series

this game is amazing it gets a little repetitive near the end but it is very fun at any level

i can see why it would look appealing but after youve spent hours playing the armored princess its extremely discouraging to have to play it all over again just to see the differences this expansion brings  so instead of fixing the original game they decided to make a standalone expansion that contains within itself the original armored princess just to have a reason to ask the people for more money  i cannot respect this respectively i cannot recommend this game
so much better than that piece of trash called kings bounty 2

big expansion of the kings bounty armored princess game  still tactical fun after several hundred hours of play recently bought again on steam after playing a lot on an earlier disk version many years back  all but the boss battles are randomized depending on the difficulty and the version of amelie you choose as well as which region you are in

bkings bounty crossworldsb is a tactical rpg that features excellent story telling and superb music it has all the elements one can expect to give players a fun progressive and challenging experience this game is very recommended to any rpg fan there is tons of new added content for armored princess and if you havent played it yet play this one instead

a lovely game and the best of the whole franchise i always like to come back to it especially after they released this dreadful kings bounty 2

a very old school heroes of might and magic style rpg its difficult to say how this game holds up for different people now a days since its core gameplay is very grindy but still offers a lot of complexity and fun expect a 2030 hour long open world campaign  with a repetitive core gameplay but plenty of different play stylestalent trees to experiment pick this one up on sale and if you dont enjoy the first couple hours id just refund it as the rest of the game is very much the same

it is improved version of armored princess get this on discount and enjoy one of great turn based strategies
